description:
Lee-Leng visits the hospital after hearing Carl’s message, though Carl’s sister Isabel tries to get in the way. Suddenly an assassin appears before them. Sensing danger Lee-Leng is able to get away and the assassin poisons himself. Isabel fears for her life because she thinks she is the one that was targeted and tells Lee-Leng that she has revealed the secret about Kajika to Quinza. Lee-Leng hurries back to the hideout fearing for Kajika’s safety, though Quinza had already come into contact with Kajika.
Source: crunchyroll
